subject: Soccer
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The former Juventus executive Luciano Moggi was among 25 people sent to criminal trial on Friday for their suspected role in Italy’s 2006 match-fixing scandal.
snippet: The former Juventus executive Luciano Moggi was among 25 people sent to criminal trial on Friday for their suspected role in Italy’s 2006 match-fixing scandal.
